data.title: ANGEL PLANELLS - Winery ÁNGEL PLANELLS Cadaqués 1901-B…
data.meta_description:
ANGEL PLANELLS - Winery
ÁNGEL PLANELLS 
 Cadaqués 1901-Barcelona 1989 
 
 Bodegó. 1929 
 Oil on panel 
 Back signed 
 Measurements 32 x 36 cm 
 
 PROVENANCE (label on back) 
 Réne Métras Gallery, Barcelona 
 Private collection 
 
 EXHIBITIONS 
 1975 (January-February), "Ángel Planells. Presences of our time", René Metrás Gallery, Barcelona 
 
 BIBLIOGRAPHY 
 Sebastián Gasch and Jordi Gimferrer, "Ángel Planells. Presences of our time", Ed. René Metrás Gallery, Barcelona 1975, reproduced cat. exp.
